meanings.definition: A person who compiles information or data.
meanings.sent1: The compilers at the library organize books and magazines.
meanings.sent2: The compilers at the office gather statistics for the report.
meanings.sent3: The compilers at the newspaper office accidentally mixed up the headlines.
meanings.sent4: She was a compiler of family recipes, blending flavors like a chef.
meanings.sent5: The compilers of the encyclopedia meticulously gathered facts for each entry.

meanings.definition: Software that translates high-level programming languages into machine code.
meanings.sent1: Programmers rely on compilers to convert their code into executable programs.
meanings.sent2: The new version of the compiler improved the efficiency of the software development process.
meanings.sent3: The compiler decided to take a break in the middle of translating the code.
meanings.sent4: The compiler worked tirelessly, transforming lines of code into functional applications.
meanings.sent5: Using the compiler felt like having a personal code translator at your fingertips.
